item.title: Push a Docker image to Azure Container Registry using a GitHub Actions workflow
item.description: Building and pushing Docker images to Azure Container Registry is simple with a small GitHub Actions workflow. This blog post assumes you’ve got a docker-compose.yml file in your GitHub repository. If you’re just using a Dockerfile, you’ll need to make a tiny amendment to the Build Docker image step in the push-to-acr.yml file described below. Microsoft Azure setup/configuration If you’re starting fresh, in terms of our Azure setup we’ll need:
